job.title: Computer Vision Algorithm Engineer
job.description: <br><strong>Summary<br></strong> <br>The computer vision algorithm engineer will work in a small and dynamic team to design and implement cutting edge computer vision algorithms for Apple products.<br><br> <br><strong>Key Qualifications<br></strong> <br>Solid fundamental Computer Vision methods and concepts<br><br>Experience on computer vision shipping product development<br><br>Solid C/C++ development skills<br><br>Experience/knowledge in 3D graphics modeling (preferred)<br><br>Experience/knowledge in large scale Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition (preferred)<br><br>Experience/knowledge in software development on embedded platform (preferred)<br><br>Team player<br><br>Passion on cutting edge computer vision/machine learning technologies and product delivery<br><br>Self motivated<br><br>Excellent problem solving skills<br><br>Excellent communication skills<br><br>Can work under stress and uncertainty<br><br>Fast learner<br><br> <br><strong>Description<br></strong> <br>Video engineering group is looking for a computer vision algorithm engineer. In this position, you will work together with similar minds in a unique development team where your skills and expertise will be put into the Apple products.<br><br> <br><strong>Education &amp; Experience<br></strong> <br>PhD in Computer Vision or similar, alternatively a comparable industry career, with significant experience in state-of-the-art Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition fields.<br><br> <br>Role Number: 200171077<br><br>
